Info.Description:
Offers comprehensive control over hue, saturation, and brightness.

Adjustments can be made for the entire image (master settings) or fine-tuned for individual color channels, including red, yellow, green, cyan, blue, and magenta. The hue range can also be altered, enabling precise color corrections and creative effects.

Properties.Name: Master Hue
Properties.Summary: Alters the overall hue of the image, shifting all colors along the color spectrum.

Properties.Name: Master Saturation
Properties.Summary: Controls the overall color intensity. Increasing enhances color vibrancy, while decreasing results in muted colors.

Properties.Name: Master Brightness
Properties.Summary: Modifies overall brightness. Higher values brighten the image, while lower values darken it.

Properties.Name: Color Hue
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the hue of individual color channels, such as reds, yellows, greens, etc.

Properties.Name: Color Saturation
Properties.Summary: Modifies the color intensity of specific channels, enhancing or reducing vibrancy in selected colors.

Properties.Name: Color Brightness
Properties.Summary: Changes the brightness of individual color channels, allowing for targeted adjustments.

Properties.Name: Color Range
Properties.Summary: Defines the range of each color affected by adjustments. Includes start falloff, start of range, end of range, and end falloff for precise tone control.
